description: Scientists using a quantum-powered haloscope have advanced the search for dark matter axions by probing higher mass ranges than before. The QUAX collaboration’s experiment, based in Italy, uses a microwave cavity and a strong magnetic field to detect faint axion signals. While no axions were found, the results help refine future dark matter searches.
title: Quantum Haloscope Sharpens the Search for Dark Matter Axions at Higher Frequencies

description: The most sensitive radio search ever conducted on interstellar object 3I/ATLAS has found no signs of alien technology. Using the Green Bank Telescope, scientists scanned key radio bands during its closest approach to Earth. All detected signals were linked to interference, strengthening the view that 3I/ATLAS is a natural object.
title: Rare Interstellar Object 3I/ATLAS Fails Alien Test, Scientists Say

description: India’s CNAP (Calling Name Presentation) uses operator-verified SIM records to display caller names at the network level, while Truecaller runs as an app using community data for caller ID, spam detection and insights. CNAP works without Internet, and a broader rollout is expected by early 2026.
title: CNAP vs Truecaller: How India’s Official Caller ID System Differs From the Popular App

description: With GST correction and expanding enterprise demand, ViewSonic aims to scale its presence across education, retail, and public spaces.
title: LED Video Walls to Power ViewSonic India's Rs. 500 Crore Growth Ambition for 2026

description: Maintaining your vehicle’s PUC validity has become more important than ever, especially in Delhi-NCR where enforcement has tightened during pollution spikes. The GRAP-IV restrictions in December have brought stricter checks to the national capital, with reports indicating that vehicles without a valid PUC are being denied fuel at petrol pumps. Thus, as authorities rely more on digital records to verify compliance, knowing how to check your PUC status online can help you avoid fines or inconvenience during daily commutes.
title: How to Check PUC Validity Of Your Vehicle Online Using Different Methods: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Prayagraj Ki Love Story is a romance drama filmed across Prayagraj, showcasing the emotional bond between two people from different backgrounds. The story has already gone viral on social media and is expected to stream on Hungama OTT in January 2026, with viewers eagerly awaiting its release.
title: Prayagraj Ki Love Story Set to Stream Soon on Hungama OTT

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series, which might include the Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+, and Galaxy S26 Ultra, is expected to be launched globally, including India, in late January 2026. However, the smartphones will reportedly not be available for purchase for nearly a month after their debut. The phones are expected to be powered by the latest Exynos 2600 chipset in some markets, while in others, they could feature the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC from Qualcomm. The design of the handsets had recently surfaced online.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Roundup: Know About the Expected Launch Timeline, Price in India, and Specifications

description: Mask is a gripping action thriller directed by Vikarnan Ashok and starring Kavin and Andrea Jeremiah. The film explores corruption, financial scams, social hypocrisy and the criminal underworld.
title: Mask OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Action-Packed Thriller Online?

description: The OTT platforms are geared up to drop intense dramas, thrillers, romance, and more for the week. Top releases include Stranger Things S5 Finale, Haq, My Korean Boyfriend, and more.
title: OTT Releases of the Week (Dec 29 - Jan 4): Stranger Things 5 Finale, Haq, Eko, Mowgli, Kumki 2, and More

description: The New Year is often the peak occasion for personalised digital interactions, and in 2025, artificial intelligence (AI) tools have quietly become part of that ritual. Instead of generic forwards, more users are turning to chatbots to craft messages that sound intentional and tailored. Whether it’s ChatGPT’s polished tone, Gemini’s creative flair, or Claude’s refined structure, AI platforms have been widely used to generate customised greetings, multilingual text and stylised formats.
title: New Year 2026 Custom Greetings: 5 Best AI Prompts for ChatGPT, Gemini, and Other AI Tools
